name: Plant Based Cheeseburger
description: The most based cheeseburger on the planet. Its taste? Brilliant. In comparison to the ordinary cheeseburger? Merely an upgrade to its glory. 75/57, nay, an alef zero/0 rating on that one.

name: The Bea Burger
description: Depending on what the meaning behind the concept of a Bea Burger is, I would either eat no more than a half of it, or make horses no longer called horses if you know what I mean.

name: The Sad European
description: "Saddest thing I've seen in my entire life" ~Andrew Dooda, my latest psychiatric patient whom I subjected to medical malpractice on purpose (I don't  ljke him)
